definition: exterior surface/family relationship via females/to show (one's opinion)/a model/a table (listing information)/a form/a meter (measuring sth)

plate/dish/tray/board/hard drive (computing)/to build/to coil/to check/to examine/to transfer (property)/to make over/classifier for food: dish, helping/to coil/classifier for coils of wire/classifier for games of chess

sentences.english: And suddenly you look at the gas mileage on the car on the dashboard.
sentences.chinese: 突然你看到汽车仪表盘上的油耗情况。

sentences.english: He sneezed a wad of snot onto the dash.
sentences.chinese: 一个喷嚏，他的鼻涕喷到仪表盘上。

sentences.english: The dashboard has just a speedometer and two simple gauges for fuel and mileage.
sentences.chinese: 汽车仪表盘上只有一个车速计及油量和里程表。

sentences.english: Bob turns to the dashboard and fiddles with the dials.
sentences.chinese: 鲍勃转身对着仪表盘，摆弄着那些旋钮。

sentences.english: A yellow light on the dashboard flashed angrily.
sentences.chinese: 仪表盘一盏黄灯闪着刺眼的光芒。

sentences.english: The electronic titanium silver instrument cluster contains two round gages revealing operating data at a glance.
sentences.chinese: 电子双圈并列式钛银仪表盘使行车数据指示一目了然。

sentences.english: They often provide a dashboard that makes the current build status immediately available.
sentences.chinese: 它们经常提供可以立即看到当前的构建状态的仪表盘。

definition: button or key (on a device)/keystroke/CL:個|个[ge4]/to press a button
glove compartment (of a car)/glovebox (sealed compartment with attached gloves for handling hazardous materials etc)
